div1.p: Gill sends Hench a manuscript of Francisco Dominguez's biography of Carlos J. Finlay.

div1.head: Letter from Robert S. Gill to Philip Showalter Hench, June 10, 1941

BALTIMORE, U. S. A.
June 10, 1941
Answering your letter
of June 6, 1941.
Dr. P. S. Hench,
Mayo Clinic,
Rochester, Minnesota.
Dear Doctor Hench:
div1.p:
In accord with your request and on
the basis of the authorization which you turned over to us of
Dr. Dominguez, we have sent forward to you the latter's manuscript
concerning the life and work of Dr. Finlay. Please return it to
us when you have finished.

Plans concerning publication are not
formulated at the moment. We shall not publish the book until
some negotiations now under way have been completed, and I can't
tell how soon that will be.
div1.closer: Sincerely yours, ROBERT S. GILL RSG:DE
